text:
Hey Folks!
I am trying to integrate Apollo with HubSpot and achieve the following: Does anyone know how I could do this? I tried Zapier but it doesn't syncs all the time.

• Sync unsubscribe from Apollo to HubSpot and vice versa
• Ability to push multiple contacts from the same company as leads
• Sync interested from Apollo to HubSpot as an opportunity
• Notify sales rep of prospects replies
